DOC.brief_summary: This is a pilot study to investigate whether patients at advanced age are fluid responders via a reversible fluid challenge, the passive leg raise test. This will be measured with a non-invasive cardiac output monitor, the LiDCO (LiDCO Hemodynamic monitoring) .
DOC.brief_title: Passive Leg Raise Induced Stroke Volume Changes in Elderly Prior to Elective Surgery Measured by LiDCOplusTM
DOC.detailed_description: The intervention is as simple as a passive leg raise with measurement of effect on Stroke volume.
